import sys
import heapq

num = int(sys.stdin.readline())
v = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
heapq.heapify(v)

for _ in range(num-1):
    x = heapq.heappop(v)
    y = heapq.heappop(v)
    heapq.heappush(v, (x+y)/2)

print(v[0])
import sys
import heapq
num = int(sys.stdin.readline())
v = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
heapq.heapify(v)

for i in range(num-1):
    x = heapq.heappop(v)
    y = heapq.heappop(v)
    heapq.heappush(v, (x+y)/2)

print(v[0])

def main():
    num_ingredients = int(input())
    ingredients = list(map(float, input().split()))
    ingredients.sort()

    while len(ingredients) > 1:
        ingredients[0] = (ingredients[0] + ingredients[1]) / 2
        ingredients.pop(1)
        ingredients.sort()

    print("{0:.2f}".format(ingredients[0]))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

import sys
import heapq

num = int(sys.stdin.readline())
v = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
heapq.heapify(v)

for i in range(num-1):
    x = heapq.heappop(v)
    y = heapq.heappop(v)
    heapq.heappush(v, (x+y)/2)

print(v[0])

def main():
    n = int(input())
    d = sorted(list(map(int, input().split())))
    print(d[n//2]-d[n//2-1])
if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
